title: Bajaj Finance raises deposit rates for 2nd time in month - Economic Times
content: Bajaj Finance raises deposit rates for 2nd time in month  Economic Times
description: Individuals, who put money for tenures of 33, 36-40 and 44 months will now earn 6.75%, 7% and 7.20%, respectively. Senior citizens can earn 25 basis points higher than this, taking the rates to 7.45% for a 44- month period.
